about_the_game:
“Embark on a unique life in this furry town!”

“You will play as a furry college student, immersing yourself in the world of the furry-filled town and participating in their stories.”

“A variety of stories gradually come together, helping you constantly search for your true self.”

“Before summer ends, leave no regrets.”

Gameplay Introduction:

The game divides a day into three time periods: morning, afternoon, and evening. During most of the time, you will control the protagonist, freely triggering events and advancing the story in a furry-themed town, immersing yourself in life in the furry town. In addition to these elements, you can invite a character you like for a walk at dusk, work part-time in the shopping street with mini-games, manage the fragile sanity value that needs to be maintained, and even do some gardening in the flower bed... and so on. With such a rich combination of elements, your life in the furry town is guaranteed to be full of fun.

●The game's cutscenes are created using 2D hand-drawn frame-by-frame animation, allowing you to see your favorite characters come to life in animation.

●The game's plot has been updated to the second day.

●The game features a semi-open map, abandoning linear progression, and you can even choose to do nothing and just relax.

●There are multiple objectives in the game, whether it's romancing characters, completing events, speedrunning for high scores, or collecting achievements, it's up to your preference with no fixed way to play.

●There are currently 12 characters in the game, with various types (more to be added).

●A more realistic way of calculating affection levels is used here, where having excessively high affection is no longer necessarily a good thing, as multiple event outcomes are controlled by the complex interaction of affection levels with multiple characters.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content that may not be suitable for all ages or for viewing during work hours: common mature content.
